item.description:
People working on the Boston civil liberties resolution campaign will meet at the ACLU office, with Nancy Murray and Marilyn Levin of the ACLU. We are now planning signature gathering at community events, fairs, and gatherings, throughout Boston in May and June.

Directions by T: Red line to Downtown Crossing, use the Chauncy Street exit (opposite end of the T stop from the Filenes Basement exit). Up the stairs and turn left on Chauncy Street. Walk one block, then look for 99 on the next block. Third floor, and go to the end of the hall (where you see an ACLU sign).

For more information, see http://aclu-mass.org/...
item.name: Boston Resolution meeting @ACLU
